Hero.title: Your partner for modern, secure and luxurious spaces
Hero.introduction: Welcome to Itsloneed, specialist in electronic security, home automation, high-performance solar solutions, and premium home finishes.
Hero.accompagnement: We support owners of villas, apartments and offices in designing secure, intelligent and elegant spaces.
Hero.mission: Our mission: to offer a perfect experience, where technology improves daily life and where every detail reflects quality and prestige.

hooks.hook1: Protect what matters most with reliable, intelligent and always connected technologies.

energy.title: Improve your energy performance
energy.description: Automate your blinds and shutters according to the weather.
details: In summer, when indoor temperature exceeds 25¬∞C, your blinds automatically lower to protect your furniture, pets and plants while keeping your home cooler.
In winter, blinds open when the sun is out to let heat in, and close to retain warmth.

centralize.description: Control all your equipment from one app.
details: Manage heating, blinds, lights and alarms from your smartphone.
Create personalised scenarios to automate your daily life.

remote.title: Control remotely
remote.description: Stay connected to your home from anywhere.
details: Control your home from anywhere in the world.
Receive real-time notifications about your home's status.

security.title: Protect your home
security.description: Secure your home with intelligent solutions.
details: Receive alerts in case of intrusion or anomaly.

smartHome.title: 4 Good Reasons to Make Your Home Smart

items.question: How to add new devices in the TaHoma¬Æ app?
items.answer: To add a new device, open the TaHoma¬Æ app, click 'Add Device', select the device type, and follow the instructions to connect it to your Wi-Fi network and integrate it into your home automation system.

items.question: How to add a voice assistant in the TaHoma¬Æ app?
items.answer: In the TaHoma¬Æ app, go to settings, select 'Voice Assistants', then choose the desired assistant (Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant‚Ä¶). Follow the steps to link your account and enable voice control for your devices.

items.question: How to choose the right automation hub?
items.answer: The choice depends on the number of devices you want to manage, the protocol type (Zigbee, RTS, Z-Wave), and the desired features (scenes, alerts, remote control). Our experts can guide you to select the right hub for your home.

items.question: How do I know if my device is compatible with your smart solutions?
items.answer: All compatible devices are listed in the TaHoma¬Æ app or on our website. Check the compatibility logos (RTS, Somfy, Zigbee, etc.) or contact support for confirmation.

items.question: Connected devices: Somfy checklist
items.answer:
‚Ä¢ Automation hub installed and connected.
‚Ä¢ Motion, opening, or temperature sensors correctly positioned.
‚Ä¢ Commands and scenes configured to automate your home.
‚Ä¢ Mobile apps installed on your devices for remote control.
‚Ä¢ Check compatibility of each new device before adding.

items.question: Is my data secure with TaHoma¬Æ switch?
items.answer: Yes. TaHoma¬Æ uses a secure protocol to protect your personal data and device information. Communications are encrypted and servers comply with European security standards.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for a connected and secure home

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 20XX, our company was born from a passion to make technology accessible to everyone. We believe every home deserves to be smart, secure, and energy-efficient.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we have developed unique expertise in integrating electronic security solutions, home automation, and solar energy. Our team of qualified experts works every day to transform your living spaces into connected and sustainable environments.
story.paragraph3: Today, we are proud to be the leader in Senegal in the smart home field, with over 500 completed projects and 98% client satisfaction.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.desc: We aim for excellence in every project, using the best technologies and practices in the market.

security.title: Security
security.desc: Our clients' security is our top priority. We guarantee reliable and durable installations.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: We stay at the forefront of technology to offer the most modern and efficient solutions.

trust.title: Trust
trust.desc: We build lasting relationships based on transparency, honesty, and professionalism.
